xcsf
Class XCSF

java.lang.Object
  xcsf.XCSF

public class XCSF
extends java.lang.Object

The main XCSF class coordinates the learning process and listeners. The main(String[]) method loads the XCSConstants, functions, Visualization, creates the xcsf-instance and evaluates the functions.

Author:
Patrick O. Stalph, Martin V. Butz

Field Detail

APPROXIMATION_FILE

public static final java.lang.String APPROXIMATION_FILE
This filename is used to temporarily store the prediction approximation.

See Also:
PredictionVis, Constant Field Values

LINE_SEPERATOR

static final java.lang.String LINE_SEPERATOR
Constructor Detail

XCSF

public XCSF(Function function,
            boolean verbose)
XCSF constructor creates the xcsf instance using the given function. The verbose flag indicates, if the performance should be printed to System.out.

Parameters:
function - the function to be learned.
verbose - determines if the performance should be printed to System.out.
Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main method loads the XCSConstants, initializes functions, registers listeners and starts XCSF. This method is used for the executable JAR package, too.

Parameters:
args - not used.

addListener

public static void addListener(XCSFListener l)
Registers the given listener for static access from all XCSF instances.

Note: Don't run two or more xcsf instances in parallel with listeners :-)

Parameters:
l - The listener to register.

removeListener

public static void removeListener(XCSFListener l)
Removes the given listener (object reference).

Parameters:
l - The listener to remove.

singleRun

public Population singleRun()
This method starts one experiment for XCSFConstants.maxLearningIterations and returns the resulting Population.

Returns:
the final population.
